title: Ranked Q downtime poll
body:
Am i the only one that hates the ranked going down at 4am? I work night shift and get home around 4-5am alot of the time and it is very annoying that i can not play when i get home :/

Thoughts? surely the pop is big enough to support ranked 24/7

replies.body: I am in the same boat, finish work at 6:30am NZST so servers are down until 10am I believe. I always fall asleep before then. I understand why they are down and don't know if it is best enabling the queues at this time as the teams will probably be really unbalanced because of the lack of players online.

yeah but after 2am it becomes alot of less.... english, in the chat. 

I'm sure the people who play from different timezones would like it open 24/7. I mean, it technically closes in Perth at 1am which is kinda bullsht

Didn't it used to be up 24/7? I would assume it is no longer up 24/7 now that preseason has begun now since, this is just speculation, less people are doing ranked? I know I'm not doing ranked anymore, although i never did much of it anyway.

> Didn't it used to be up 24/7? I would assume it is no longer up 24/7 now that preseason has begun now since, this is just speculation, less people are doing ranked? I know I'm not doing ranked anymore, although i never did much of it anyway.

it wasnt open 24/7 on OCE like...ever. it closes at 4AM nsw time and opens again at 8AM. its not alot of down time, but it hella annoying getting in a 55 minute game at 3 and not finding anyone in queue at 4.
